title: Climb Out Of Bronze Together!
body:
Would like a duo or team to climb together.

I prefer mainly JG,ADC sometimes Mid.
Mechanics are decent.
Add Me Twurtle.

replies.body:
Ye I'll play with you mate

Add me: CLG Hippy elf 
(Dumb name, I know) and we can talk 
I main adc and can play support decently 
Unranked but usually around low silver, rn mmr is in b2
So yeah, we can talk about this once we add each other 
Sick mechanics btw :)
